Header: Cabinet approval to purchase liquid petroleum
Content: The cabinet of Ministers has granted approval to purchase liquid petroleum to address the gas shortage in the country. Accordingly, 12,000 metric tons of liquid petroleum will be purchased by the government. The Ministry of Finance has taken an immediate measure to realize the transaction and gas will be supplied to the market in due course. Meanwhile, the cabinet approval has also been given to provide relief to journalists who received intimidations. Accordingly, 78 journalists will be compensated as per the committee recommendations given on the matter. The committee was appointed to inquire intimidation caused on journalists in between years 2005 and 2015.
